Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Shah Rukh Khan did not make the statement about leaving India if Modi becomes the Prime Minister.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a photoshopped tweet and there is no actual evidence of Shah Rukh Khan making the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Shah Rukh Khan made the statement, without verifying the authenticity of the tweet.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the tweet attributed to Shah Rukh Khan was actually made by a parody Twitter handle and later clarified by Khan himself.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by attributing a statement to Shah Rukh Khan that he did not make.
Understate: There is no understatement bias present in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing accurate information about the origin of the tweet and the clarification made by Shah Rukh Khan.
